org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.policy

Interface ActiveTriggerCallback


  • public interface ActiveTriggerCallback
    In case an ActiveTriggerPolicy is used, it can implement own Runnable classes. Such Runnable classes will be executed as an own thread and can submit fake elements, to the element buffer at any time. The factory method for runnables of the ActiveTriggerPolicy gets an instance of this interface as parameter. The describes adding of elements can be done by the runnable using the methods provided in this interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sendFakeElement(Object datapoint)
      Submits a new fake data point to the element buffer.

    • Method Detail

      • sendFakeElement

        void sendFakeElement(Object datapoint)
        Submits a new fake data point to the element buffer. Such a fake element might be used to trigger at any time, but will never be included in the result of the reduce function. The submission of a fake element causes notifications only at the ActiveTriggerPolicy and ActiveEvictionPolicy implementations.
        Parameters:
        datapoint - the fake data point to be added
